DOC.brief_summary: Effects herbal product weight loss , weight maintenance metabolic rate . - The objective study evaluate efficacy two herbal weight loss product , BioLean BioLean Free compare match placebo , effect appetite suppression , change metabolism , weight loss , safety overweight men woman 12 month active weight loss weight maintenance program . - This randomize double-blind study . The planned sample size 180 healthy , overweight ( BMI 27-40 ) male female age 18-60 .
DOC.brief_title: Use Herbal Supplements Weight Loss Weight Maintenance
DOC.detailed_description: • The study data collection occur two phase , active weight loss ( phase 1 ) weight maintenance ( phase 2 ) . Transition phase 2 individually determine participant attainment goal ‘ healthy ’ weight . During 52 week participant pick supplemental pill , weight measure , meet educational meeting every week basis . Upon enter phase 2 , participant option educational session monthly basis every week . Participants goal ‘ healthy ’ weight determine baseline combination personal goal , Harris Benedict Equation goal , body composition goal , BMI range . All participant put weight reduction plan reach goal randomly assign one 3 treatment group , Biolean , Biolean Free , Placebo . Since expect participant reach goal weight others , 2nd milestone data collection occur attainment goal weight . To assure participant 3 data collection point , participant expect reasonably reach goal weight 34 week 2nd milestone data collection 26 week . The 3rd milestone data collection participant 52 week initial intake supplement . Upon attainment goal weight 2nd data collection point , participant educate weight maintenance plan give new meal plan achieve long term healthy weight maintenance .
DOC.criteria: Between 1860 year age , overweight ( Body Mass Index 2740 ) desire weight loss , normal EKG ( electrocardiogram ) , use stable dosage appetite affect medication ( e.g. , Prozac SSRIs , Synthroid , steroid ) , nonpregnant screen serum pregnancy test female childbearing capacity use acceptable method birth control ( tubal ligation , abstinence , properly use condom diaphragm , oral implanted contraceptive , intrauterine device ) To consider childbearing potential , participant must least one year postmenopausal surgically sterile , willing able comply protocol requirement , willing able give inform consent , regular source health care permission primary care provider . Chronic health problem ( include obesity , allergy , skin problem , occasional GERD IBS symptom ) . Participant may bulimia laxative abuse , substance abuse , alcohol intake > 10 oz . per week , treatment psychiatric disorder ( include depression , bipolar disorder , anxiety determine selfreport phone screen Beck Inventory survey complete screening visit ) , determine screening . Use ephedrinecontaining product past 3 month , unwillingness limit use caffeinated beverage three cup per day participation study , active cigarette smoking > 1 cigarette per week , rest systolic blood pressure > 140 mmHg diastolic > 90 mmHg pulse < 55 > 100 , female pregnant breastfeeding .
